pullRequest.title: CLDR-11687 Update Dojo
pullRequest.bodyText:
CLDR-11687
-Change Dojo version from 1.10.4 to 1.14.1
-Add async: true in dojoConfig, fix warning XMLHttpRequest with the synchronous flag set to true is deprecated
-Delete unused files referencing different dojo versions: dojoheader.jspf, ...xpath-linkify...
-Change all dojo.ready to require ... dojo/ready ...
-Change all dojo.string to require ... dojo/string ...
-Encapsulate dojo xhr in new IIFE cldrStAjax in new strict file CldrStAjax.java
-Replace deprecated xhrGet and xhrPost with dojo/request
-Remove obsolete second parameter ioArgs from error handlers; new cldrStAjax.errResponseText
-Include ajax_status.jsp in about.jsp and browse.jsp rather than include dojo there directly
-Skip timer in survey.js when included by about.jsp and browse.jsp
-Return silently if st_err undefined for updateStatus in about.jsp and browse.jsp
-Delete @module from survey.js; unfortunately it is not a module (yet)
-Declare variable k in getTagChildren for eventual use strict
-Comments

Checklist

 Issue filed: https://unicode-org.atlassian.net/browse/CLDR-11687
 Updated PR title and link in previous line to include Issue number

commit.message:
CLDR-11687 Update Dojo

-Change Dojo version from 1.10.4 to 1.14.1

-Add async: true in dojoConfig, fix warning XMLHttpRequest with the synchronous flag set to true is deprecated

-Delete unused files referencing different dojo versions: dojoheader.jspf, ...xpath-linkify...

-Change all dojo.ready to require ... dojo/ready ...

-Change all dojo.string to require ... dojo/string ...

-Encapsulate dojo xhr in new IIFE cldrStAjax in new strict file CldrStAjax.java

-Replace deprecated xhrGet and xhrPost with dojo/request

-Remove obsolete second parameter ioArgs from error handlers; new cldrStAjax.errResponseText

-Include ajax_status.jsp in about.jsp and browse.jsp rather than include dojo there directly

-Skip timer in survey.js when included by about.jsp and browse.jsp

-Return silently if st_err undefined for updateStatus in about.jsp and browse.jsp

-Delete @module from survey.js; unfortunately it is not a module (yet)

-Declare variable k in getTagChildren for eventual use strict

-Comments

nodes.bodyText:
So, this used to be an embeddable service - the old bug tracker was able to import it and turn 53b7f2338d33498b in a bug report into something clickable.
At the time of moving to Jira, it was already broken.
So yes, let's delete this. It would be replaced by a proper API on the survey tool side.
There is instead https://st.unicode.org/cldr-apps/browse.jsp which uses ../browse_results.jsp and ../xpath_results.jsp
